name: Form Field
description: A Form Field is to elicit a response in the form of string and number.
designGuidelinesDo: Fields should have labels vertical orientation.
Arrange text fields within a two column layout.
If there are character limits, use the Count Down variant.
When possible, use field lengths that correspond to the information the user is inputting.
designGuidelinesDoNot: Three (plus) column layouts since multi-column layouts increase user errors.
Default information within the input area.

componentProps.name: type
componentProps.desc: Set to "textarea" to render a textarea.

componentProps.name: placeholder
componentProps.desc: Specifies the form fields placeholder text.

componentProps.name: onChange
componentProps.desc: Specifies an onChange event to be triggered when input value is changed.

componentProps.name: preventPaste
componentProps.desc: Will prevent data from being pasted into the input from the clipboard.

componentProps.name: id
componentProps.desc: The input ID represents the JSON property that the input value is mapped to.

componentProps.name: label
componentProps.desc: Specifies the Form Field's label text.

componentProps.name: value
componentProps.desc: Specifies the value to be supplied to the input field.

componentProps.name: required
componentProps.desc: Specifies whether the Form Field is required.

componentProps.name: regex
componentProps.desc: Prevents non-matching characters from being input.

componentProps.name: rows
componentProps.desc: Defines the height of rows displayed in the "textarea" type.

componentProps.name: className
componentProps.desc: Appends custom CSS classes to component.

componentProps.name: hasError
componentProps.desc: Enables the error state.

componentProps.name: warningText
componentProps.desc: Adds warning text below Form Field.

componentProps.name: helpText
componentProps.desc: Adds help text below Form Field.

componentProps.name: errorText
componentProps.desc: Adds error text below Form Field.

componentProps.name: maxLength
componentProps.desc: Specify a maximum number of characters for the input.

componentProps.name: showCharCount
componentProps.desc: Displays a hint below the Form Field which will count down the amount characters left.

componentProps.name: successText
componentProps.desc: Adds success text below Form Field.

componentProps.name: hasWarning
componentProps.desc: Enables the warning state.

componentProps.name: isLoading
componentProps.desc: Adds a loading underline to the field. This should be used with "disabled" or "readOnly".

componentProps.name: onBlur
componentProps.desc: Specifies an onBlur event to be triggered when input value is blurred.

componentProps.name: onKeyDown
componentProps.desc: Specifies an onKeyDown event to be triggered when input value is changed with a key press.

componentProps.name: onPaste
componentProps.desc: Specifies an onPaste event to be triggered when input value is changed with a clipboard paste.

componentProps.name: name
componentProps.desc: Adds the input name attribute value.

componentProps.name: aria-describedby
componentProps.desc: Indicates the ID of the input to describe the object.

componentProps.name: disabled
componentProps.desc: Adds the disabled attribute to the input.

componentProps.name: readOnly
componentProps.desc: Adds the readOnly attribute to the input.
